Publication Title: Deep Learning on Multimodal Chemical and Whole Slide Imaging Data for Predicting Prostate Cancer Directly from Tissue Images
Publication Authors: Md Inzamam Ul Haque, Debangshu Mukherjee, Sylwia A Stopka, Nathalie Y R Agar, Jacob Hinkle, Olga S Ovchinnikova
Publication Abstract: Prostate cancer is one of the most common cancers globally and is the second most common cancer in the male population in the US. Publication Assay: Deep Learning, Hematoxylin and Eosin Staining Method, MALDI-TOF Mass Spectrometry
